system.description: The character has trained extensively in unarmed combat, turning their body into a weapon.
system.benefit: Character counts as having the Natural Weapons Trait applied to their unarmed capabilities. Natural Weapons: Natural Weapon does 1d10 + Strength Bonus Damage with Primitive (7), cannot parry with natural weapons, nor be disarmed except through literal disarming.

specialAbilities.name: Natural Weapons
specialAbilities.description: Your unarmed attacks deal 1d10+SB damage with Primitive (7). You cannot be disarmed of your natural weapons.
